name: #77 BearEye the Fable
description: A half breed - an inarticulate cross between an Eye Kin and an unknown being, not found commonly in the Land of Black and White - stood on a small pedestal, with his short 5ft stature holding up a large head that seemed unfit on its body, and dressed in oversized Eye Kin wear.\n\n[Season 2, Chapter 6 - Turmoil](https://eyeverse.world/s2-ch6)
